p: LX2 cells, an immortalized human HSC line, were provided by Beina Chuanglian Biotechnology Research Institute (Beijing, China). The cells were maintained with 10% or 1% foetal bovine serum in DMEM supplemented with 10% (activated culture) or 2% (quiesced culture) foetal bovine serum (FBS, PAN), 100 IU/ml penicillin, and 100 μg/ml streptomycin (Gibco, 15140-122). Cells were incubated in a 5% CO 2 humidified atmosphere at 37 °C.
